short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hides review scores on Pitchfork by default and allows the user to toggle their visibility.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension that hides review scores on Pitchfork by default. To toggle a score's visibility, simply click on the empty "score circle" (where the score usually is).
